trans-unit.source: Represents an HTML element inside of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 代表網頁內的 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: HtmlElement represents any possible type of element in an HTML document, such as `BODY`, `TABLE`, and `FORM`, among others.
trans-unit.target: HtmlElement 代表 HTML 文件中的項目之任何可能類型例如`BODY`， `TABLE`，和`FORM`，和其他項目。

trans-unit.source: The class exposes the most common properties you can expect to find on all elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會公開最常見的屬性，您可以預期所有項目上找不到。

trans-unit.source: Most elements can have *child elements*: other HTML elements that are placed underneath them.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的項目可以有*子項目*︰ 位於其下方的其他 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A> property to test whether a given element has children, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> collection to iterate through them.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>屬性來測試是否為指定項目具有子系，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>集合來逐一查看這些。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A> property returns the HtmlElement in which the current element is nested.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A>屬性會傳回在目前的項目巢狀 HtmlElement。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You often need access to attributes, properties, and methods on the underlying element that are not directly exposed by HtmlElement, such as the `SRC` attribute on an `IMG` element or the `Submit` method on a `FORM`.
trans-unit.target: 您通常需要存取的屬性、 屬性和基礎項目上公開的方法不直接由 HtmlElement，例如`SRC`屬性`IMG`項目或`Submit`方法`FORM`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> methods enable you to retrieve and alter any attribute or property on a specific element, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A> provides access to any methods not exposed in the managed Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>方法可讓您擷取及修改任何屬性或屬性上的特定項目，雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>提供存取任何未公開在受管理文件物件模型 (DOM) 的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application has unmanaged code permission, you can also access unexposed properties and methods with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DomElement%2A> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式具有 unmanaged 程式碼權限，您也可以存取未公開的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DomElement%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DomElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TagName%2A> property to test whether an element is of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TagName%2A>要測試的項目是否屬於特定型別的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any HTML document can be modified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段可以修改任何 HTML 文件。

trans-unit.source: You can create new HtmlElement objects with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A> method of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>, and add them to another element using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立新的 HtmlElement 物件與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>，並將其新增到另一個項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also create the elements as HTML tags and assign them to an existing element's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立為 HTML 標記的項目，並將它們指派給現有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection"></xref> of all elements underneath the current element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection"></xref>的目前項目之下的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: To access only those elements which have the current element as their direct parent, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取僅將目前的項目，當做其直接父這些項目，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>集合而。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection will not necessarily be returned in source order.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的項目不一定會傳回來源順序。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all elements that are direct or indirect children of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 目前項目的直接或間接子系的所有項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the current element is a `TABLE`, for example, All will return every `TH`, `TR`, and `TD` element within the table, as well as any other elements, such as `DIV` and `SPAN` elements, contained within the cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的項目是`TABLE`，例如，全部會傳回每個`TH`， `TR`，和`TD`以及任何其他項目，例如在資料表中的項目`DIV`和`SPAN`中儲存格所包含的元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element to another element's subtree.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入至另一個項目樹狀子目錄。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) enables you to alter the run-time contents of an HTML file in a number of ways.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 可讓您修改 HTML 中的檔案數種方式的執行階段內容。

trans-unit.source: Use AppendChild to add new elements to an existing document, or to move an element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 將新項目加入現有的文件，或移動項目頁面上，請使用 AppendChild。

trans-unit.source: If an element has already been parented, appending an element to another element will automatically remove that element from its previous parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果父代的項目，將項目附加至另一個項目會自動移除該元素從先前父代。

trans-unit.source: Any additions made to a document at run-time using AppendChild will not be persisted when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowSaveAsDialog%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段文件進行任何新增項目使用 AppendChild 不會保存在呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowSaveAsDialog%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowSaveAsDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> to append to this location in the tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>来附加至這個位置，在樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The element after it has been added to the tree.
trans-unit.target: 項目之後加入樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 將具名事件的事件處理常式加入 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 上。

trans-unit.source: The Managed Document Object Model (DOM) exposes only a select number of events.
trans-unit.target: 管理文件物件模型 (DOM) 會公開只有選取的事件數目。

trans-unit.source: Most of the unexposed events are only defined for specific types of elements; such as the `submit` event, which is valid only on `FORM` elements.
trans-unit.target: 針對特定類型的項目; 只定義的大多數未公開的事件例如`submit`事件，這是只有在有效`FORM`項目。

trans-unit.source: Use AttachEventHandler to add an event handler to these unexposed events.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AttachEventHandler 這些未公開的事件加入事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該附加至文件或其物件事件，直到文件已完成載入。

trans-unit.source: The earliest you should call this method is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 您應該呼叫這個方法最舊的處於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available unmanaged events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and the IHTMLElement interfaces: [IHTMLElement](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876), [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877), [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878), [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879).
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的 unmanaged 事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[存取 Managed HTML 文件物件模型上的未公開成員](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)與樣式有關介面︰[樣式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876)， [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877)， [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878)， [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event you want to handle.
trans-unit.target: 您想要處理事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The managed code that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 處理事件的 managed 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element can have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個項目是否可以有子項目。

trans-unit.source: Some elements, such as `IMG` and `SCRIPT`, cannot have any children.
trans-unit.target: 某些項目，例如`IMG`和`SCRIPT`，不能有任何子系。

trans-unit.source: Use this property before you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> on an arbitrary element.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，才能呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A>任意項目上。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if element can have child elements; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目可以有子項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection"></xref> of all children of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection"></xref>之所有目前的項目子系。

trans-unit.source: Many of the elements inside of an HTML file can have other HTML elements underneath them.
trans-unit.target: 許多 HTML 檔案內的項目可以有其下方的其他 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The Children collection provides a simple mechanism for exploring the tree structure of a document.
trans-unit.target: 子系集合提供簡單的機制，用來瀏覽文件的樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Children only exposes elements whose direct parent is the current element.
trans-unit.target: 子系只會公開其直接父代為目前的項目項目。

trans-unit.source: If you have an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> for a `TABLE` element, Children will give you all of the `TR` (row) elements inside of the `TABLE`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>如`TABLE`項目子系會提供您的所有`TR`（資料列） 內的項目`TABLE`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the `TD` (cell) elements contained inside of the `TR` elements, you will need to use either the Children collection on each individual `TR` element, or use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A> collection on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取`TD`（儲存格） 內所包含的項目`TR`項目，您必須使用每個個別的子系集合`TR`項目或使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A>

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection are not guaranteed to be in source order.
trans-unit.target: 來源順序不保證此集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A> is `false`, `Children` will always be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>是`false`，`Children`永遠為空白。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> objects that have the current element as a parent.
trans-unit.target: 所有的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>將目前的項目，當做父代的物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks on the element with the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下滑鼠左鍵的元素上時。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the default action for a Click event on an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定取消 Click 事件的項目上的預設動作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Click event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> class itself, unless you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Click 事件的項目上，也會發生在該元素的父項目，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>類別本身，除非您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the user clicks on an element that does not currently have input focus, the Click event will occur after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing> event, but before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus> event for that element.
trans-unit.target: 之後如果使用者按一下時不會不目前擁有輸入焦點的項目上，按一下事件將會發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing>事件前,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus>該元素的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需取消事件反昇和取消事件的預設動作之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[關於 DHTML 物件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the client area of the element in the HTML document.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文件中取得項目的工作區的界限。

trans-unit.source: ClientRectangle will return position data only for elements that have been assigned an explicit height and width, or elements that use absolute positioning.
trans-unit.target: ClientRectangle 會傳回位置資料，只對項目已指派明確的高度和寬度或使用絕對位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: A document is absolutely positioned if its position style is set to `absolute`, after which it can be positioned at any coordinate on the HTML page.
trans-unit.target: 文件絕對定位的位置樣式設定為如果`absolute`之後的它可以位於任何座標上的 HTML 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The client area occupied by the element, minus any area taken by borders and scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端佔據的區域項目，減去任何框線和捲軸的區域。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the position and dimensions of the element inclusive of its adornments, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle*> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的位置和維度的項目，包含其裝飾時，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle*>改用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: Removes an event handler from a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 從 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 上的具名事件移除事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event you want to handle.
trans-unit.target: 您想要處理事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The managed code that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 處理事件的 managed 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument"></xref> to which this element belongs.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument"></xref>所屬這個項目。

trans-unit.source: Some HTML pages can host frames using the `FRAMESET` tags.
trans-unit.target: 某些 HTML 頁面可以裝載框架使用`FRAMESET`標記。

trans-unit.source: In this case, each individual `FRAME` element will contain its own instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，每個個別`FRAME`元素會包含自己的執行個體的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: This property is most useful when you have received a reference to an element in an event handler from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>, and need to perform some action on the document in which the element resides.
trans-unit.target: 當您從事件處理常式中收到的項目參考，這個屬性便最有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>，而且需要執行一些動作項目所在的文件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The parent document of this element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目的父代文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an unmanaged interface pointer for this element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目取得 unmanaged 的介面指標。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> is a wrapper for the Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM), which is written using the Component Object Model (COM).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>是包裝函式的 Internet Explorer 文件物件模型 (DOM)，以撰寫使用元件物件模型 (COM)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: If you need to access unexposed properties or methods on the underlying COM interfaces, such as `IHTMLElement`, you can use this object to query for them.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要存取未公開的屬性或方法的基礎 COM 介面，例如`IHTMLElement`，您可以使用此物件來查詢它們。

trans-unit.source: In order to use the unmanaged interfaces, you will need to import the MSHTML library (mshtml.dll) into your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的 unmanaged 的介面，您必須將 MSHTML 程式庫 (mshtml.dll) 匯入您的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also execute unexposed properties and methods using the `Invoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您也可以執行未公開的屬性和方法使用`Invoke`方法。

trans-unit.source: The COM `IUnknown` pointer for the element, which you can cast to one of the HTML element interfaces, such as `IHTMLElement`.
trans-unit.target: COM`IUnknown`指標的項目，您可以轉換成 HTML 元素的其中一個介面，例如`IHTMLElement`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the left mouse button over an element twice, in rapid succession.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下滑鼠左鍵的項目上兩次，快速而連續。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以設定的時間之間應該被視為按兩下滑鼠按鍵的按一下，而不是兩次按一下。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the default action for a DoubleClick event on an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定取消 DoubleClick 事件項目上的預設動作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A DoubleClick event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> class itself, unless you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 項目上的 DoubleClick 事件也會發生在該元素的父項目，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>類別本身，除非您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when text is dragged to the following locations: - Within or between HTML pages hosted in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control or Internet Explorer - To another application - To the Windows desktop You can cancel the default action for a Drag event on an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳文字到下列位置時，就會發生此事件:-內或之間 HTML 網頁中裝載<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項或 Internet Explorer 的另一個應用程式至 Windows 桌面，您可以藉由設定取消拖曳事件項目上的預設動作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the user can input data into this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否使用者可以輸入此元素的資料。

trans-unit.source: For `FORM` elements such as text boxes and radio buttons, setting Enabled to `false` will prevent the user from using these form fields.
trans-unit.target: 如`FORM`元素，例如文字方塊和選項按鈕，設為 已啟用`false`會防止使用者使用這些表單欄位。

trans-unit.source: For other elements, such as `DIV` or `SPAN`, setting Enabled to `false` will cause all text within the element to appear shaded; however, the text will still be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 對於其他項目，例如`DIV`或`SPAN`，設為 已啟用`false`會導致出現陰影的項目內的所有文字; 不過，文字會仍可選取。

trans-unit.source: To cancel selection, add an event handler for the unexposed `onselectstart` event using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AttachEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消選取，將 未公開的事件處理常式`onselectstart`事件使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AttachEventHandler%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AttachEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element allows user input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next element below this element in the document tree.

trans-unit.source: Use FirstChild in conjunction with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.NextSibling%2A> to walk the document tree for an HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用 FirstChild<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.NextSibling%2A>查核 HTML 文件的文件樹狀結構。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.NextSibling%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> representing the first element contained underneath the current element, in source order.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>代表包含來源順序中的目前項目底下的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Puts user input focus on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 將使用者輸入的焦點放在目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: Setting the focus on an element both gives that element focus and makes it the active element; for example, the element that has focus will be returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.ActiveElement%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 設定焦點的項目上同時該元素的焦點轉移並使它的作用中的項目;例如，具有焦點的項目會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.ActiveElement%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.ActiveElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any key strokes entered by a user after Focus has been called will be sent to that element.
trans-unit.target: 將使用者輸入焦點呼叫之後任何按鍵會傳送至該元素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element first receives user input focus.
trans-unit.target: 此項目第一次收到使用者輸入的焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: An element that had focus before the user switched to another application using the taskbar or the ALT+TAB keys will receive the Focusing and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus> events again when the user switches back to your application.
trans-unit.target: 切換到另一個使用工作列或 ALT + TAB 鍵的應用程式的使用者將獲得 Focusing 之前焦點的項目和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus>事件一次當使用者切換回您的應用程式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: You cannot cancel the default behavior of this event.
trans-unit.target: 您無法取消此事件的預設行為。

trans-unit.source: To remove focus from an element, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A> on a different element from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除焦點的項目，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A>內的不同項目上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Focusing event on an element will also occur on that element's parents and on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> class itself, unless you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 項目上的 Focusing 事件也會發生該元素的父代，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>類別本身，除非您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>

trans-unit.target: 如需取消事件反昇和取消事件的預設動作之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[關於 DHTML 物件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the named attribute on the element.
trans-unit.target: 擷取項目上具名屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An attribute in HTML is any valid name/value pair for that element.
trans-unit.target: 以 HTML 屬性，則該元素的任何有效的名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> exposes only those attributes that are common to all elements, leaving out those that only apply to certain types of elements; `SRC` is a predefined attribute for the `IMG` tag, for example, but not for the `DIV` tag.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>公開 （expose) 只會留下任何這些僅適用於特定類型的項目; 的所有項目的通用的屬性`SRC`是預先定義的屬性`IMG`標記，例如，但不適用於`DIV`標記。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Use GetAttribute and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> to manipulate attributes not exposed on the managed Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 使用 Xmlelement 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>操作不會公開在受管理文件物件模型 (DOM) 的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: GetAttribute and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Xmlelement 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>不區分大小寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This argument is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個引數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute on the element, as a <xref:System.String> value.
trans-unit.target: 將項目上這個屬性的值做為<xref:System.String>值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the specified attribute does not exist on this element, returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的屬性不存在這個項目上，會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of elements represented in HTML by the specified `HTML` tag.
trans-unit.target: 擷取由指定表示在 HTML 中的項目集合`HTML`標記。

trans-unit.source: The name of the tag whose <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> objects you wish to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 標記名稱其<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>您想要擷取的物件。

trans-unit.source: An containing all elements whose `HTML` tag name is equal to tagName.
trans-unit.target: 包含所有項目其`HTML`標記名稱等於 tagName 。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 可做為特定類型的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>雜湊程式碼

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element has received user input focus.
trans-unit.target: 項目已經收到使用者輸入的焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: You can neither cancel this event's default behavior, nor prevent it from bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 您無法取消此事件的預設行為，也無法防止反昇。

trans-unit.source: To remove focus from an element, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A> on a different element from within the GotFocus event.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除焦點的項目，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A>Exit 事件內的不同項目上。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需取消事件反昇和取消事件的預設動作之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[關於 DHTML 物件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a label by which to identify the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來識別項目的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Id must be unique; you cannot have two elements with the same Id inside of the same document.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼必須是唯一的。您不能有兩個具有相同識別碼相同的文件內的項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A> property to give the same identifier to a group of logically related elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A>屬性來提供一組邏輯相關的項目相同的識別項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTML markup underneath this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此項目之下的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to add new elements to an existing HTML page, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有幾種方式可以將新項目新增至現有的 HTML 頁面上，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using InnerHtml is often the fastest way to add new content when you have to set many attributes or styles on your new elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 InnerHtml 通常是最快的方法，您必須在您的新項目上設定多屬性或樣式時，將新的內容。

trans-unit.source: InnerHtml differs from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A> in that InnerHtml will not include the HTML that represents the object you are calling.
trans-unit.target: InnerHtml 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>InnerHtml 將不會包含代表物件的 HTML，您所呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A> for more information about the difference between these two properties.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>如需有關這兩個屬性之間的差異。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting InnerHtml destroys any children previously appended to the element.
trans-unit.target: 設定 InnerHtml 終結先前附加至項目的任何子系。

trans-unit.source: If you retrieve an element from the DOM and then assign new HTML to its parents' InnerHtml property, your reference to that element will be useless, and its behavior when it calls its properties and methods is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果您從 DOM 中擷取的項目，然後將新的 HTML 指派給其父代 InnerHtml 屬性您對該元素的參考是毫無意義，並呼叫其屬性和方法時，其行為未定義。

trans-unit.source: For some elements, setting InnerHtml is not a valid operation.
trans-unit.target: 某些項目，設定 InnerHtml 不是有效的作業。

trans-unit.source: Some HTML tags have no closing tag, such as the `IMG` tag, and therefore cannot contain nested elements.
trans-unit.target: 某些 HTML 標記中有沒有結結尾標記，例如`IMG`標記，並因此不能包含巢狀項目。

trans-unit.source: Some tags, such as the `SCRIPT` tag, can only contain text content; setting InnerHtml will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 某些標記，例如`SCRIPT`標記中，僅可包含文字內容; 設定 InnerHtml 會導致錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For both types of tags, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A> property will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種類型的標記<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>屬性會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you also cannot set InnerHtml on `TABLE` and `TR` elements, as assigning malformed HTML to these elements could corrupt the rendering of the document.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您也無法設定 InnerHtml`TABLE`和`TR`項目，做為將指派給這些元素的格式不正確的 HTML 可能會損毀文件的呈現。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> or the `insertRow` and `insertCell` methods on the unmanaged `IHTMLTable` interface to add rows and cells to a `TABLE`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>或`insertRow`和`insertCell`上未受管理的方法`IHTMLTable`介面来加入的資料列和儲存格`TABLE`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need only to assign text to an element and not HTML markup, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只需要將文字指派給項目和沒有 HTML 標記，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value to InnerHtml will destroy any text values previously assigned using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: InnerHtml 指派的值將會損毀先前指派 使用任何文字值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that defines the child elements of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 定義目前項目的子項目之 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Creating child elements on this element is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許建立子項目，這個項目上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text assigned to the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指派給元素的文字。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to assign HTML to an element with InnerText, the HTML code will display as literals in the document, just as if you were viewing HTML within a text file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試將 HTML 指派給具有 InnerText 的項目，就如同您檢視 HTML 文字檔案中顯示的 HTML 程式碼與文件中的常值。

trans-unit.source: If you assign HTML to an element using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> property, InnerText will return all of the text in that HTML with the markup removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指派給項目使用的 HTML<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>屬性，InnerText 將傳回的所有文字，以標記的 HTML 中移除。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value to InnerText will destroy any child elements that belong to the element.
trans-unit.target: 將值指派至 InnerText 會破壞任何屬於元素的子項目。

trans-unit.source: The element's text, absent any HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 此項目的文字，不存在的任何 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: If the element contains child elements, only the text in those child elements will be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目包含子項目，就會保留那些子項目中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The specified element cannot contain text (for example, an `IMG` element).
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目不能包含文字 (例如，`IMG`項目)。

trans-unit.source: Insert a new element into the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 插入新元素插入文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method until after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫這個方法之前之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控制項已發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method before then can result in an exception, as the document will not have finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 之前呼叫這個方法可能會導致例外狀況，如文件未完成載入。

trans-unit.source: Whether a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation> is valid will depend on the type of the element.
trans-unit.target: 值是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation>無效，將取決於項目的類型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation>

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation> is valid if the element is a `DIV`, but not if it is a `SCRIPT` or `IMG` element, neither of which can contain child elements.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation>有效項目，則如果`DIV`，但不是它是否`SCRIPT`或`IMG`項目，這兩者可以包含子項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation>

trans-unit.source: Where to insert this element in relation to the current element.
trans-unit.target: 要插入此項目相對於目前的項目位置。

trans-unit.source: The new element to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入新項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> that was just inserted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>剛剛插入。

trans-unit.source: If insertion failed, this will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入失敗，這會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Executes an unexposed method on the underlying DOM element of this element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目的基礎 DOM 項目上執行未公開的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to call methods from the Document Object Model (DOM) that do not have equivalents in managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來呼叫方法的文件物件模型 (DOM)，在 managed 程式碼中沒有對等項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this version of InvokeMember to execute unexposed methods that take no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個版本的 InvokeMember 執行未公開的方法會採用任何引數。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property or method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用方法之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The element returned by this method, represented as an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，傳回的項目表示為<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If this <xref:System.Object> is another HTML element, and you have a reference to the unmanaged MSHTML library added to your project, you can cast it to its appropriate unmanaged interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個<xref:System.Object>另一個 HTML 項目，而且您必須參考加入至您的專案將 unmanaged MSHTML 程式庫，您可以將它轉換成其適當的 unmanaged 介面。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Executes a function defined in the current HTML page by a scripting language.
trans-unit.target: 執行指令碼的語言由目前的 HTML 頁面中定義的函式。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to call methods from the Document Object Model (DOM) that do not have equivalents in managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來呼叫方法的文件物件模型 (DOM)，在 managed 程式碼中沒有對等項目。

trans-unit.source: All arguments supplied to InvokeMember will be converted to Win32 `VARIANT` data types before they are passed to the named scripting function.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 InvokeMember 的所有引數都會轉換成 Win32`VARIANT`資料類型才能傳遞至具名的指令碼函式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property or method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用方法之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A list of parameters to pass.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞的參數清單。

trans-unit.source: The element returned by the function, represented as an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 函數所傳回的項目表示為<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If this <xref:System.Object> is another HTML element, and you have a reference to the unmanaged MSHTML library added to your project, you can cast it to its appropriate unmanaged interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個<xref:System.Object>另一個 HTML 項目，而且您必須參考加入至您的專案將 unmanaged MSHTML 程式庫，您可以將它轉換成其適當的 unmanaged 介面。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: KeyDown occurs before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyPress>, which in turns occurs before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyUp>.
trans-unit.target: KeyDown 發生之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyPress>、 在開啟之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyUp>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyUp>發生</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the default action for a KeyDown event on an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定取消 KeyDown 事件項目上的預設動作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A KeyDown event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> class itself, unless you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 KeyDown 事件也會發生在該元素的父項目，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>類別本身，除非您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>類別`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需取消事件反昇和取消事件的預設動作之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱[關於 DHTML 物件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the Name property to retrieve elements from a document using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection.GetElementsByName%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 使用名稱屬性來擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection.GetElementsByName%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument></xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection.GetElementsByName%2A>文件中的項目

trans-unit.source: When applied to `INPUT` elements, Name defines the variable name for that element's data when its form is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當套用至`INPUT`項目，名稱時，請定義項目資料的變數名稱及其表單提交給伺服器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the element's name.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>代表項目的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the next element at the same level as this element in the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個文件樹狀目錄中的項目相同層級的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Use NextSibling in conjunction with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.FirstChild%2A> to walk the document tree for an HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用 NextSibling<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.FirstChild%2A>查核 HTML 項目的文件樹狀結構。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.FirstChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> representing the element to the right of the current element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>右邊的 目前的項目代表的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element from which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle*> is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle*>計算。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways: default flow positioning; relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent; and absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document.
trans-unit.target: 可以在其中一種方式在 HTML 網頁上放置項目︰ 預設流動位置;相對定位在項目位移的固定數量相對於其父代。和絕對定位中的項目提供固定協調文件的左上角相對的位置。

trans-unit.source: When a document's elements use relative or absolute positioning, you can use `OffsetParent` to calculate an element's coordinate position in the client area.
trans-unit.target: 當文件的項目使用相對或絕對位置時，您可以使用`OffsetParent`計算項目的工作區中的座標位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關項目定位在 HTML 中，請參閱[相關項目定位](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The element from which the offsets are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 從其中計算位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: If an element's parent or another element in the element's hierarchy uses relative or absolute positioning, <xref uid="langword_csharp_OffsetParent" name="OffsetParent" href=""></xref> will be the first relatively or absolutely positioned element in which the current element is nested.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目的父代或另一個項目的階層中的項目使用相對或絕對位置<xref uid="langword_csharp_OffsetParent" name="OffsetParent" href=""></xref>將會在目前的項目巢狀的第一個相對或絕對定位項目。

trans-unit.source: If none of the elements above the current element are absolutely or relatively positioned, <xref uid="langword_csharp_OffsetParent" name="OffsetParent" href=""></xref> will be the `BODY` tag of the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何目前的項目上方的項目會具有絕對或相對位置， <xref uid="langword_csharp_OffsetParent" name="OffsetParent" href=""> </xref>將`BODY`文件的標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of an element relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對於其父項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways: - Default flow positioning.
trans-unit.target: 可以在其中一種方式在 HTML 網頁上放置項目:-預設流動位置。

trans-unit.source: - Relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: -相對定位在項目位移的固定數量相對於其父代。

trans-unit.source: - Absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document.
trans-unit.target: -絕對位置，在這項目提供固定協調文件的左上角相對的位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關項目定位在 HTML 中，請參閱[相關項目定位](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinate positions of the element, and its width and its height, in relation to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 個項目，以及其寬度和高度，相對於其父代的 x 和 y 座標位置。

trans-unit.source: If an element's parent is relatively or absolutely positioned, OffsetRectangle will return the offset of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目的父代相對或絕對定位，OffsetRectangle 會傳回父項目的位移。

trans-unit.source: If the element itself is relatively positioned with respect to its parent, OffsetRectangle will return the offset from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目本身而言具有相對位置相對於其父代，OffsetRectangle 會傳回位移，從其父代。

trans-unit.source: Compares two elements for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個項目相等。

trans-unit.source: The equality operator tests the `IUnknown` pointers of the underlying COM objects wrapped by the supplied <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> classes.
trans-unit.target: 等號比較運算子測試`IUnknown`包裝由所提供的基礎 COM 物件的指標<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 第二個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, or if both elements have the same underlying COM interface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個參數都<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，或如果兩個項目有相同的基礎 COM 介面; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>物件是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 第二個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> is only one element is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, or the two objects are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>只有一個項目是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，或兩個物件不相等，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current element's HTML code.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前項目的 HTML 程式碼。

trans-unit.source:
Whereas will return all HTML contained in the current element excluding the current element's surrounding tags, OuterHtml includes the current element's tag as well as the HTML that tag contains, for example: `` `` `
` `Hello` `
` `World` `
` `How are you?` `
` `
` `
` `` `` In this example, calling OuterHtml on `div2` will return: `
` `World` `
` `How are you?` `
` `
` Calling will return: `World` `
` `How are you?` `
` If you assign a new value to OuterHtml, the current element reference will become invalid; it will not reflect the name, properties and child content of the HTML you have just assigned.
trans-unit.target:
OuterHtml 而會傳回所有包含在目前的項目，但不包括目前的項目周圍標記的 HTML，包含目前的項目標記，以及 HTML 標記包含，例如︰ `` `` `
` `Hello` `
` `World` `
` `How are you?` `
` `
` `
` `` ``在此範例中，在呼叫 OuterHtml`div2`會傳回︰ `
` `World` `
` `How are you?` `
` `
`會傳回呼叫: `World` `
` `How are you?` `
`您指派新值給 OuterHtml，如果目前的項目參考將會變成無效; 它不會反映名稱您已指派的 html 屬性和子系內容。

trans-unit.source: The HTML code for the current element and its children.
trans-unit.target: 目前的項目和其子系的 HTML 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current element's text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to assign HTML to an element with OuterText, the HTML code will display as literals in the document, just as if you were viewing HTML within a text file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試將 HTML 指派給具有 OuterText 的項目，就如同您檢視 HTML 文字檔案中顯示的 HTML 程式碼與文件中的常值。

trans-unit.source: If you assign HTML to an element using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> property, OuterText will return all of the text in that HTML with the markup removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指派給項目使用的 HTML<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>屬性，OuterText 將傳回的所有文字，以標記的 HTML 中移除。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value to OuterText will destroy any child elements that belong to the element.
trans-unit.target: 將值指派至 OuterText 會破壞任何屬於元素的子項目。

trans-unit.source: The text inside the current element, and in the element's children.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的項目，以及項目子系的文字。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set text outside of this element.
trans-unit.target: 您無法設定這個項目之外的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element's parent element.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前項目的父項目。

trans-unit.source: The Parent property enables discovery of an element's context.
trans-unit.target: 父屬性可讓項目內容的探索。

trans-unit.source: It is most useful inside of event handlers such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>, which can fire for any element anywhere in the document's object hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 它是最有用的事件處理常式內例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>，它可以引發的任何文件的物件階層架構中的任何位置的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>

trans-unit.source: The Parent property of the HTML element (the top of an HTML document) points back to itself.
trans-unit.target: HTML 項目 （HTML 文件頂端） 的父屬性指回本身。

trans-unit.source: If you call Parent inside a loop, verify that the loop's break condition compares the type of the current element and the type of the `Parent` property, or else your code may execute an infinite loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在迴圈內呼叫父代，請確認迴圈的中斷條件比較目前的項目類型和類型`Parent`或是您的程式碼的屬性，可能會執行一個無限迴圈。

trans-unit.source: The element above the current element in the HTML document's hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文件的階層中目前的項目上方的項目。

trans-unit.source: Causes the named event to call all registered event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 讓具名的事件呼叫所有已註冊的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to access HTML Document Object Model (DOM) events.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來存取 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 事件。

trans-unit.source: It directly calls the [IHTMLElement3::fireEvent](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=103189) method.
trans-unit.target: 直接呼叫[IHTMLElement3::fireEvent](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=103189)方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use the DOM through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> class, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用透過 DOM<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>類別，請參閱[存取 Managed HTML 文件物件模型上的未公開成員](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The name of the event to raise.
trans-unit.target: 要引發的事件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Removes focus from the current element, if that element has focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果該元素具有焦點移除它的焦點從目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus> event for the element.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus>項目的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: When focus is cleared from an element using this method, it is given to the document containing the element, not to the next element in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 從使用此方法的項目清除焦點時，它可以包含項目，而不定位順序中的下一個元素的文件。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls through the document containing this element until the top or bottom edge of this element is aligned with the document's window.
trans-unit.target: 文件包含這個項目，直到這個項目的頂端或底端邊緣對齊的文件視窗中捲動。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the top of the object will be displayed at the top of the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，物件上方將會顯示在視窗的頂端。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the bottom of the object will be displayed at the bottom of the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，物件的下方將會顯示在視窗底部。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the edge of the element and the left edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的邊緣和其內容的左邊的緣之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The full dimensions of the scroll area are available using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>; `ScrollLeft` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A> are exposed independently because these are the only two properties of the scroll area that developers can set.
trans-unit.target: 是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>; 提供的完整捲動區域的維度`ScrollLeft`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A>因為這些是開發人員可以設定捲軸區域只有兩個屬性個別公開。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the element and the left edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 以像素項目左邊的緣和其內容的左邊的緣之間距離。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dimensions of an element's scrollable region.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目的可捲動區域的維度。

trans-unit.source: An element will have a scrollable region if its content exceeds the size of its dimensions, unless the overflow style on the element forbids rendering scrollbars.
trans-unit.target: 項目會有可捲動區域若內容超過維度的大小除非項目上的溢位樣式禁止轉譯捲軸。

trans-unit.source: You cannot modify the size of the scroll area directly, but you can modify the distance between the edges of the scroll area and the edges of the element.
trans-unit.target: 您無法直接修改捲動區域的大小，但您可以修改捲動區域的邊緣和項目的邊緣之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A> properties to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A>屬性，以達到這個目的。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: The size and coordinate location of the scrollable area of an element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的可捲動區域大小和座標位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the edge of the element and the top edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的邊緣和其內容的上邊緣之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The full dimensions of the scroll area are available using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A> and `ScrollTop` are exposed independently because these are the only two properties of the scroll area that developers can set.
trans-unit.target: 是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>; 提供的完整捲動區域的維度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A>和`ScrollTop`因為這些是開發人員可以設定捲軸區域只有兩個屬性個別公開。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, between the top edge of the element and the top edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 以像素的項目上邊緣和其內容的上邊緣之間距離。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the named attribute on the element.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目上的具名屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An attribute in HTML is any valid name-value pair for that element.
trans-unit.target: HTML 中的屬性是任何有效的名稱 / 值組，該元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> exposes only those attributes that are common to all elements, leaving out those that only apply to certain types of elements; `SRC` is a predefined attribute for the `IMG` tag, for example, but not for the `DIV` tag.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>公開 （expose) 只會留下任何這些僅適用於特定類型的項目; 的所有項目的通用的屬性`SRC`是預先定義的屬性`IMG`標記，例如，但不適用於`DIV`標記。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and SetAttribute to manipulate attributes not exposed on the managed Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>和 SetAttribute 來操作不會公開在受管理文件物件模型 (DOM) 的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `attributeName` is not a defined attribute on an element, SetAttribute will define it on the element as a new attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果`attributeName`定義的屬性不是在某個元素 SetAttribute 會定義它做為新屬性項目上。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and SetAttribute are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>和 SetAttribute 不區分大小寫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the `class` attribute on an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> , you must refer to the attribute as `className` when specifying the first argument to SetAttribute
trans-unit.target: 若要設定`class`屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>，您必須參考屬性做為`className`時第一個引數指定給 SetAttribute</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of styles for the current element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的項目樣式的分號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) uses styles as defined in the World Wide Web Consortiums Cascading Style Sheets specification to control the display of an element.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 會使用樣式全球資訊網協會階層式樣式表規格中所定義來控制顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Styles in the Style property take the form of colon-delimited name-value pairs, with each pair separated by a semicolon, as follows: `style-name1:value1;...;[style-nameN:valueN;]` To set the font for a `DIV` element to 14-point Times New Roman bold, for example, you would assign the following string: `font-face:Times New Roman;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;` For a full list of all available styles in the HTML DOM, see [STYLE Attribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性中的樣式採用分號分隔名稱 / 值組，與每個以分號分隔的如下所示的成對的形式︰`style-name1:value1;...;[style-nameN:valueN;]`設定字型`DIV`要 14 點 Times New Roman 粗體的項目，例如，您會指派下列字串︰ `font-face:Times New Roman;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;` HTML DOM 中的所有可用樣式的完整清單，請參閱[樣式屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: A string consisting of all of the element's styles
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含所有的項目樣式

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of this element in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定定位順序中的這個項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: TabIndex determines which element in an HTML document will next receive focus when the user presses the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: TabIndex 決定 HTML 文件中的哪個項目接下來將會接收焦點時使用者按下 TAB 鍵。

trans-unit.source: By default, the only elements included in the tab order are `INPUT` elements, the `SELECT` control, and any element whose `contentEditable` property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會在定位順序中所包含的唯一元素`INPUT`項目，`SELECT`控制項，以及任何項目其`contentEditable`屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can include any HTML element in the tab order, such as a `DIV`, by assigning it an explicit TabIndex.
trans-unit.target: 您可以包含任何 HTML 項目定位順序，例如`DIV`，藉由指定明確的定位點索引。

trans-unit.source: Valid values for TabIndex range from -32767 to 32767.
trans-unit.target: 從-32767 到 32767 之間的定位點索引範圍的有效值。

trans-unit.source: The numeric index of the element in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 定位順序中的項目之數值索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 取得 HTML 標記的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Many elements in the HTML Document Object Model have attributes, properties, and methods that are unique to those elements; such as the `HREF` attribute on the `A` element, or the `Submit` method on `FORM`.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文件物件模型中的許多項目有屬性、 屬性和對這些項目，都是唯一的方法例如`HREF`屬性`A`項目，或`Submit`方法`FORM`。

trans-unit.source: Use TagName when you have an element of a potentially arbitrary type, and need to perform a type-specific operation.
trans-unit.target: 當您有可能任意類型的項目，而且需要執行特定類型的作業，請使用 TagName。

trans-unit.source: The name used to create this element using HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立這個項目以 HTML 標記的名稱。
